abstract.t: This document defines how Unique Local IPv6 Unicast Addresses (RFC- 4193) can be used in wireless mobile ad hoc networks (MANETs) as MANET Local IPv6 Addresses (MLAs). MLAs are intended to be used inside a MANET and are not expected to be routable on the global Internet. Each MANET router is expected to generate its MLA locally without any coordination with other MANET routers.
